short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Updates CSS to fix the highlight panel fields.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Salesforce Fix Highlight Panel Fields is a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your experience on Salesforce Lightning record pages. This extension dynamically updates the CSS of specific elements, ensuring that the compact fields in the highlight panel remain fixed, regardless of page scrolling.

Key Features:

Keeps highlight panel fields fixed at the top for better visibility and accessibility.
Automatically adjusts CSS to ensure smooth transitions and a seamless user experience.
Compatible with most Lightning record page templates in the standard app.
Easy installation with no configuration required.


Disclaimer:

This extension works with almost all templates of Lightning record pages in the standard Salesforce app. However, it may not support record pages in the console app.
This extension is not affiliated with or endorsed by Salesforce.
Use at your own risk; the developer is not responsible for any issues that arise from using this extension.
Regular updates will be provided to enhance compatibility and functionality.


Enjoy a more efficient and user-friendly Salesforce Lightning experience with Salesforce Fix Highlight Panel Fields!
